abstract: Don’t look to Jan Hatzius, the highly respected chief economist at Goldman Sachs, for a pep talk on the economy.
snippet: Don’t look to Jan Hatzius, the highly respected chief economist at Goldman Sachs, for a pep talk on the economy.
lead_paragraph: Don’t look to Jan Hatzius, the highly respected chief economist at Goldman Sachs, for a pep talk on the near-term state of the economy. As he writes in a client note today:
